title: ice: `bad placeholder type` / `broken MIR` / `TyKind::Error constructed but no error reported` / `mir_const_qualif: MIR had errors` / `implemented const `ASSOC` has an incompatible type for trait`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-stable
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from one stable version to another.

body:
### Code Crashes since at least `1.52.1` ```Rust trait Trait { const ASSOC: fn(&'static u32); } impl Trait for () { const ASSOC: Fn(i32) -> _ = |_| (); } fn main() { let _ = <() as Trait>::ASSOC; } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.72.0-nightly (43062c43d 2023-06-09) binary: rustc commit-hash: 43062c43d2a63cf4e261c6eddc417575c4f3062f commit-date: 2023-06-09 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.72.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.5 ``` ### Error output ``` warning: trait objects without an explicit `dyn` are deprecated --> /home/matthias/vcs/github/rust/tests/icemaker/E3FB1755AFF2085B0BE6926348C0D441AF8E0D93985C19DC8D5E725FBE8DF8E9.rs:6:18 | 6 | const ASSOC: Fn(i32) -> _ = |_| (); | ^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = warning: this is accepted in the current edition (Rust 2015) but is a hard error in Rust 2021! = note: for more information, see = note: `#[warn(bare_trait_objects)]` on by default help: use `dyn` | 6 | const ASSOC: dyn Fn(i32) -> _ = |_| (); | +++ ```
Backtrace

``` warning: trait objects without an explicit `dyn` are deprecated --> /home/matthias/vcs/github/rust/tests/icemaker/E3FB1755AFF2085B0BE6926348C0D441AF8E0D93985C19DC8D5E725FBE8DF8E9.rs:6:18 | 6 | const ASSOC: Fn(i32) -> _ = |_| (); | ^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = warning: this is accepted in the current edition (Rust 2015) but is a hard error in Rust 2021! = note: for more information, see = note: `#[warn(bare_trait_objects)]` on by default help: use `dyn` | 6 | const ASSOC: dyn Fn(i32) -> _ = |_| (); | +++ error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: bad placeholder type --> /home/matthias/vcs/github/rust/tests/icemaker/E3FB1755AFF2085B0BE6926348C0D441AF8E0D93985C19DC8D5E725FBE8DF8E9.rs:6:29 | 6 | const ASSOC: Fn(i32) -> _ = |_| (); | ^ | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_hir_analysis/src/collect.rs:383:20 0: ::emit_diagnostic 1: ::delay_span_bug:: 2: ::ty_error_with_message:: 3:
